page.title: 09PEOPLE OF RHU AND DISTRICT
page.content: In our area we have people of many varied walks of life.There are those whose families have lived in the district for many generations,those who have married into the community and families that have moved here in recent years.Reasons behind this influx of newcomers include:1)many have come to work in Base_related jobs 2)as it is a pleasant area in which to live people choose to settle here e.g. elderly people like to retire here, commuters to Glasgow buy homes and those who enjoy sailing are enticed by the various facilities on offer.Until recently,however,many young people had been forced to move to find suitable accommodation but with the allocation of more council homes to this age group and the development of the more reasonably priced,compact Broseley estate, this trend is being reversed.
